text: was a Japanese actor and narrator. He voiced the roles of Masuo Fuguta in Sazae-san and Jam Ojisan in Soreike! Anpanman. He also voiced Kame-Sennin during the last episodes of Dragon Ball Z and all of Dragon Ball GT. He worked for the Tokyo Actor's Consumer's Cooperative Society. He retired in August 2019. Masuoka died on March 21, 2020 from rectal cancer, aged 83. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Japanese voice actors
title: Hiroshi Masuoka (voice actor)
